title: ModernGuard LLM guardrail API
description:
ModernGuard is an ultra-fast prompt attack detection API, a fine-tuned modernBERT model. It doesn’t just recognize the most recent, common (and uncommon) prompt injection and jailbreaking patterns — it continuously learns from your data and feedback, mitigating security and reputational risks in every AI interaction.

It’s part of GuardionAI, the GenAI security solution built to monitor, protect, and control AI agents.
